pages.text:
About our Drive-In Theatre
About our Drive-In Theatre
The Ruskin Family Drive-In Theatre offers great movies, good food, and a family atmosphere. We have a 2,000 square foot screen, clean restrooms, snack bar and clean parking lot. We are open year round  rain or shine, hot or cold, including holidays!
Check our movies page for weekly movies and our box office hours.
Prices
Admission is $7.00 per person; This is for 2 Movies. Children 5 to 8 years old are $2.00 per child. Children 4 years old and younger are free. Prices are subject to change without notice. We only accept cash, no checks or credit cards allowed.
Policies
We are a family oriented drive-in theatre. We expect and demand as part of the admission price that every patron respect every other patron’s right to hear and see the movie in peace and quiet. The following are a few rules for patrons of our drive-in:
We do NOT allow alcohol or drugs on the premises. (This includes opened container, unopened container, or consumed!). Any vehicle or person having alcohol (any beverage containing any percentage of alcohol is strictly prohibited) and will be refused admittance to this drive-in.
No ROWDINESS is allowed.
The purchase of an admission to enter the Ruskin Drive-In Theatre only allows the purchaser of said admission ticket the right to hear and see the movie on the theatre’s screen. Any other activity is prohibited. Anyone engaging in any other activity will be barred from the theatre permanently.
Sitting or lying in the empty parking space is absolutely not permitted.
No sitting or lying on top of vehicles. You Must stay in front of your vehicle if you wish to sit outside.
Children must be accompanied by an adult at all times.
All large vehicles must park on the last 2 rows of speakers.
We never show X-rated or NC-17 rated films.
No motorcycles or RV’s are allowed in the drive-in.
We allow you to bring your dogs with you to the drive-in as long as you keep them on a leash, they do not bark around people, and you clean up after them
You must either use your radio in your vehicle or bring a portable radio to hear the movies, we have a limited number of radios to rent in the snack bar. We Charge $5.00/radio and we hold your drivers license, or some other form of identification with a picture on it.
All lights from your vehicle (headlights, daytime running lights and parking lights must be kept off during the movies. If you cannot turn your lights off please bring a blanket to cover your lights

Current Movies
Movies for September 12th - 18th
MOVIE #1 (8:00 pm)
Movie 2 (9:20 pm)

Contact
Contact Us
Ruskin Family Drive-In Theatre is located at 5011 U.S. Hwy 41 North, Ruskin, Florida 33572
Phone:
813-645-1455 (answering machine only)
E-mail
us at:
Ruskinfamilydrivein@Verizon.net
Driving Directions
From the South (Bradenton/Sarasota):
Travel North on I-75; at the Sun City Center/Ruskin exit, Turn left WEST on CR 674 ,go to US 41 right turn heading north; Pass 19th Ave. Drive-In is on the right side of the road.
From the North (Tampa/Brandon):
Travel South on I-75; at exit# 246- Apollo Beach exit turn left, head WEST on CR 672, turn left at US 41 heading south about 4.5 miles. Drive-In is on the left side of the road.
From South Pinellas County:
Merge onto I-275 South (toward Bradenton); take the US-41exit (exit# 2) toward Palmeto/Bradenton; merge onto US-41/FL-45 north toward Port Manatee. Stay on US 41 enter Hillsborough County; enter Ruskin go thru passing a Sweetbay (right side of road), Next traffic light is 19th Ave., Drive-In is just north of 19th Ave. on the right side of road.
